name: TELL
description:
You know the story. A curse spreading via communication, a vengeful ghost behind it... However, this time you are the angry ghost girl.

Tell is a shot jam game made in roughly 16 hours trying to capture the feeling of being a ringu-esque ghost with a match-3 gameplay because I refuse to make an idle game.

  • The symbols are group of people. Click on them to curse them, then click again to lead them to other groups.
  • Groups die after a few seconds of being lead. Each kill gives you 10 points but costs some energy.
  • Moving groups will drag groups with the same symbol along. Match 3 or more to score 1000 points and recover energy for each symbol.

Liked this short mess? Check out my bigger Steam messes.
